channel.title: How to make ice barrage not require runes
channel.description: I've tried so many times but yet nothing..Help me out here

item.title: How to make ice barrage not require runes
item.dc:creator: @HazzardScape HazzardScape
item.description:
@HazzardScape wrote:

dno if this way would work just a suggestion of the top of my head if it would be easyer serching for the rune’s item ID’s and deleating the part where it say if player has blah blah blah cast spell = true (just a suggestion)

item.source: How to make ice barrage not require runes

item.title: How to make ice barrage not require runes
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

change your ice barrage to this:

if (spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)
{
if (playerLevel[6] > 93) {
{
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25);
startAnimation(1979);
castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer();
castOnPlayer.uberentangle();
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
PkingDelay = 11;
inCombat();
stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
// stillgfx(387, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
// castOnPlayer.stillgfx(387, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.sendMessage(“You have been frozen!”);
sendMessage(“You poison and freeze the enemy!”);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 0);
deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 0);
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(555), 0);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
} else if (playerLevel[6] <= 124) {
sendMessage(
“You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell.”);
}

Read full topic
